abstract: Caterpillar, the world’s largest maker of earthmoving machinery, will take control of a 44-year-old Japanese venture with Mitsubishi Heavy Industries to help expand in Asia.
lead_paragraph: Caterpillar, the world’s largest maker of earthmoving machinery, will take control of a 44-year-old Japanese venture with Mitsubishi Heavy Industries to help expand in Asia.

headline.main: Caterpiller Moves to Take Control of Japan Venture
